Author: fishonthesun
Text: It definitely sounds like you're dehydrated! That happens to me when I'm having coffee, alcohol, energy drinks, or pop all day instead of water.  Herbal tea, iced or hot, seems to be a substitution that doesnt dehydrate. If it has caffeine it'll act as a diuretic and dehydrate you, so if you are worried about the headache, try having a cup of water alongside your Pepsi
